Text: Tabataba suivi de pawana is the title of two short stories "Tabataba" followed by "Pawana"("")in one book written in French by French Nobel laureate J. M. G. Le Clézio .
Triplets:<J. M. G. Le Clézio

Text: Tabataba suivi de pawana: "Tabataba" was written by Bernard-Marie Koltès and Hector Poullet.
